action.description: Moves classes and their associated resources to another module
Migrates the project to use Non-Transitive R classes
Enables Instant Apps Support for a Module
Pulls out style-related attributes from layout and extract them as a new style
Extracts one or more views into a separate layout
Replaces attributes by Android style reference where possible
Submit feedback to the Android Studio team
Adds a new data sample file
Switches the Live Literals highlights on/off
